original_text: Wine will destroy that proud enemy. They do not stop attacking other people. They never have enough for themselves. They are like death that is so hungry that it eats as much as it can. The deep hole of death eats everything. The cruel enemy is like that! They want all the nations to belong to them. They catch everyone to be their prisoners.
korean_text: 그는 술을 즐기며 거짓되고 교만하여 가만히 있지 아니하고 스올처럼 자기의 욕심을 넓히며 또 그는 사망 같아서 족한 줄을 모르고 자기에게로 여러 나라를 모으며 여러 백성을 모으나니

sentences.original_text: Wine will destroy that proud enemy.
sentences.korean_translation: 포도주는 그 교만한 적을 파멸시킬 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They do not stop attacking other people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 사람들을 공격하는 것을 멈추지 않는다.

sentences.original_text: They never have enough for themselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신을 위해 결코 충분하지 않다.

sentences.original_text: that it eats as much as it can.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 할 수 있는 한 많이 먹는다.

sentences.original_text: The deep hole of death eats everything.
sentences.korean_translation: 죽음의 깊은 구멍은 모든 것을 먹는다.

sentences.original_text: The cruel enemy is like that!
